definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: You might also want to install a control panel for your graphic card .
sentences.chinese: 您可能還想爲您的圖形卡安裝一個控制面板。

sentences.english: More expensive “accelerated” graphics cards are equipped with circuitry that optimizes such tasks.
sentences.chinese: 爲了優化此類工作，電路需安裝更昂貴的加速圖形卡。

sentences.english: That means that the graphics card’s shaders can be used from within any application.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着圖形卡渲染器可以在任何應用程序內使用。

sentences.english: Your computer’s graphics card has to do a lot of work and must do it quickly.
sentences.chinese: 計算機的圖形卡需要快速的做大量工作。

sentences.english: RAM and the graphic card are also two important factors for the quality of the laptop.
sentences.chinese: 公羊和圖形卡也是兩個質量的重要因素，筆記本。

sentences.english: XGA is an intelligent color graphics adapter with nigh resolution.
sentences.chinese: XGA高分辨率彩色圖形卡是一種智能型圖形適配器。
